items.title: Fed Cut Wipes Out Leverage as Bitcoin Supply Ratio Drops
Digitap’s $100k 24-Hour Haul: Is This the XRP Killer Investors Have Been Waiting For?
items.excerpt: Something just pulled in $100,000 in a single day, and it might be the answer to XRP’s institutional limitations. DigiTap, the world’s first omni-bank, managed to raise six figures in 24 hours by solving what XRP couldn’t – making crypto accessible to everyone, not just banks.

items.title: CZ Warns Crypto Firms of North Korean Hacker Threats
items.excerpt: Binance founder Changpeng Zhao (CZ) has issued a warning to crypto projects about North Korean hackers.

items.title: Crypto ready for 'up only' mode once US TGA hits $850B target: Arthur Hayes
items.excerpt: Crypto markets will enter “up only” mode once the United States Treasury hits its target goal of filling the General Account (TGA), the Treasury Department’s bank account, with $850 billion, according to Arthur Hayes, co-founder of the BitMEX crypto exchange.

items.title: Bitcoin will 'accelerate' as world heads into the Fourth Turning — Analyst
items.excerpt: Bitcoin ( BTC ) is poised to grow in price and adoption regardless of the macroeconomic scenarios that will unfold in the coming years and decades, as the global financial system heads for a Fourth Turning-style reset, according to market analyst Jordi Visser.

items.title: Bitcoin mining difficulty paints new ATH amid centralization fears
items.excerpt: The Bitcoin ( BTC ) mining difficulty, a metric that tracks the relative challenge of adding new blocks to the ledger, climbed to a new all-time high of 142.3 trillion on Friday.

items.title: ‘All Classic Signs of a Top:’ Crypto Analyst Rings Bitcoin (BTC) Alarm
items.excerpt: Bitcoin (BTC) declined modestly on Friday, as its rally lost steam as enthusiasm about lower US borrowing costs tapered off.

items.title: 3 Big Wave Signals XRP Could Pump Big in October
items.excerpt: Compared to the leading cryptocurrency, Bitcoin, the altcoin posted higher gains mid-way through September. Bitcoin grew by 2.5% over the same period that XRP gained 5%.

items.title: Kraken taps Trust Wallet to expand Backed xStocks’ tokenized equities
items.excerpt: Crypto exchange Kraken, the main distribution partner for Backed’s tokenized equities product xStocks, has partnered with Trust Wallet, one of the world’s largest self-custody crypto wallets, to extend the reach of tokenized equities to users.
